author: Steve
text: I want to carry your bags in Fiji

author: Chuck Norris
text: No one can beat me up - except Patrick Maher.

author: Kana
text:
Hi Everyone! 

Just wanted to let you know that we have hotel rooms available at the PepperTree in Santa Barbara. If you are interested in booking a room please email me and I will forward you the information. I'd highly advise to reserve a room as soon as possible since that weekend is a holiday and the rooms are going fast. At this time, we have sent out the Save the Dates and the invitations will be sent soon. :) So excited!

Also, on the top this site there is a link that says "RSVP." When you receive your invitation you will have instructions on how to RSVP online or the option of mailing back (depends on how computer savvy we think you are - so please don't take it personal if we send you a mail back card. For those of you with online instructions, the first step is to come to this website and click on the "RSVP" link. After that point, you will put in your code and will be asked select which pre-selected guests will be attending and your dinner choice since it's sit down plated dinner. 

I also wanted to address the question "can I bring an additional person?" At this time, we have a max capacity of 65 guests for this event and I'd greatly appreciate it if only those listed on the invitations arrive to the event. It was a very hard decision and we really want this event to be a small intimate group who we have every intention to spoil! :)

Please let me know if you have any questions at all. 

We love you all!
Love,
Paul and Kana

author: Nancy& Fred in PA
text: We can't wait to see you all!

author: Ted & Teruko Uekuma
text:
Hi, Kana-chan and Paul, 
Congratulations!We're very happy to share your special day together soon.
The photo of the "save the date" card looks like a movie scene of a love story. We love it!

author: Eliana Gillaspy
text: Such a pretty invite! I can't wait for your wedding!!!! :)

author: Shunsuke
text:
Hi!! Conglatuations!!!
such a nice pictures!

author: Kana's Mom
text: Dad and I are so happy for you to have found your soulmate. We welcome Paul into our family and wish you both the best. Love you, my favorite daughter!! Mom
